a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Share of the population with access to basic services, World
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
Note: Access to clean cooking fuels is important for the reduction of indoor air pollution. Improved sanitation facilities include flush/pour flush,
ventilated improved pit latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilets.
